name: Patty
text: On Play If your deck has 20 cards or less, you may return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

effect.text: If your deck has 20 cards or less, you may return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

meta.notes: Rarity 'UC' confirmed from the 'UC' symbol next to the card number. Power value is clearly 5000. Cost is clearly 3. The card is a Character with the attribute Slash and the type East Blue.
